Report generated: 2025-12-01 03:35:17

======================================================================
Test Case 3 (3D): The 'Quadratic Decay'
======================================================================

Isotropic diffusion with forcing and Robin BCs.
Exact solution: u = exp(-t) * (1 + x^2 + y^2 + z^2)
Forcing: F = -exp(-t) * (7 + x^2 + y^2 + z^2)
Robin BC: u + du/dn = g (alpha=1, beta=1)
Time range: t in [0, 2]

======================================================================
SPATIAL CONVERGENCE STUDY
======================================================================
  Grid  11^3: dx = 0.100000, L-inf error = 1.228914e+02, L2 error = 8.876921e+01
  Grid  16^3: dx = 0.066667, L-inf error = 1.251987e+02, L2 error = 9.403093e+01
  Grid  21^3: dx = 0.050000, L-inf error = 1.261171e+02, L2 error = 9.658353e+01
  Grid  31^3: dx = 0.033333, L-inf error = 1.273051e+02, L2 error = 9.907807e+01
  Grid  41^3: dx = 0.025000, L-inf error = 1.277999e+02, L2 error = 1.003022e+02

----------------------------------------------------------------------
